description:
go.net/ipv4: update package documentation

- fix more multicasting section as pointed out in go.net/ipv6 review
- simplify example codes
- do word alignment; s/multicast group address/multicast group/

messages.text:
Hello dave@cheney.net (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go.net

LGTM.

https://codereview.appspot.com/10322043/diff/5001/ipv4/doc.go
File ipv4/doc.go (right):

https://codereview.appspot.com/10322043/diff/5001/ipv4/doc.go#newcode39
ipv4/doc.go:39: //			if err := ipv4.NewConn(c).SetTOS(DiffServAF11); err != nil {
very nice

https://codereview.appspot.com/10322043/diff/5001/ipv4/doc.go#newcode142
ipv4/doc.go:142: // group addresses.  For example, a UDP listener with port 1024 might
... may join multiple multicast {groups,addresses} // pick one

ping

Hello dave@cheney.net (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=7ffc008ad4b1&repo=net ***

go.net/ipv4: update package documentation

- fix more multicasting section as pointed out in go.net/ipv6 review
- simplify example codes
- do word alignment; s/multicast group address/multicast group/
